jobDescription: Our Oil Gas client is looking for a data analyst to assist with data integrity, fulfillment, and scheduling. The candidate must have strong excel skills with previous applicable experience using pivot tables, v-look up, and experience with analyzing and organizing data. The data analyst must demonstrate strong communication skills and phone etiquette.  The ideal candidate for this position will have strong excel skills including pivot tables, v-look ups and recent accounting experience.  Send an updated copy of your resume to Katelyn.Shanks@accountemps.com or contact Accountemps at 210-696-8300 or at www.accountemps.com
